Headline: #53A South Pulaski Temporary Northbound Reroute near Pulaski/115th
ShortDescription: Northbound 53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Kedzie, 111th, and Pulaski due to, street blockage near Pulaski/115th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Kedzie, 111th, and Pulaski due to, street blockage near Pulaski/115th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute near 75th/Exchange
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses temp. rerouted EB: 75th, Exchange, 76th, Coles and 75th; WB: 75th, Exchange, 73rd, Yates and 75th due to, street blockage near 75th/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 75th/Exchange.

Eastbound buses will operate via 75th, Exchange, 76th, Coles and 75th.

Westbound buses will operate via 75th, Exchange, 73rd, Yates and 75th.

Allow extra travel time.
